actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 172 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 172 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Klobuchar. (consideration: CR S249-251; text: CR S250) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to lowering prescription drug prices for Americans by importing drugs from Canada and other countries.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 172 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Klobuchar.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to lowering prescription drug prices for Americans by importing drugs from Canada and other countries.
